heading: 3.1.1 Create a conda environment to run ProkGenomics
text: Create conda environment required dependencies. Use following commands. Versions successfully tested : nextflow 21.10.6, singularity-ce version 3.9.9-focal, singularity version 3.8.6Use conda activate ProkGenomics_ENV every time want use nextflow, singularity profileAlternatively, can install nextflow singularity without using conda.Install nextflow using nextflow installation instructions.Install nextflow using nextflow installation instructions.Install singularity following instructions, make sure following right instructions system (Linux, Windows Mac)Install singularity following instructions, make sure following right instructions system (Linux, Windows Mac)
code:
# if you can create conda env, this could work for a cluster, server or your own computer. 
conda create -n ProkGenomics_ENV
conda activate ProkGenomics_ENV
conda install -c bioconda nextflow=21.10.6
conda install conda-forge::singularity
conda install apptainer
